title: AI Research Intern
description: Conduct research on NLP models, assist in developing machine learning pipelines, and analyze large datasets using Python and TensorFlow.

title: Junior Data Analyst
description: Work with SQL and Python to clean, analyze, and visualize data. Build reports and support business decisions.

title: Backend Developer (Python)
description: Design and implement scalable backend services using FastAPI and SQLAlchemy. Collaborate with frontend and data teams.
